MOON SHINE, S05E02, The International drive to return to the Moon is gathering pace, this multi- nation effort is readying to return, stay and utilise the Lunar assets.

programme.title: Stars Above
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Stars Above, S02E09, Stars are a bit like human beings. They can be warm or cold, they come in all kinds of shapes and sizes.

programme.title: The Planet Makers
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Planet Makers, S01E05, From the beginnings of our Solar System four and half billion years ago there remains tantalizing clues to its evolution; remnent debris: asteroids and comets.

programme.title: Next Stop Mars
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Next Stop Mars, S01E04, It has fired our imaginations for millennia, Mars, the God of War and the source of Man's science fictional demise.

programme.title: Set Course For Heart of the Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Set Course For Heart of the Sun, S04E02, NASA’S Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europe’s Solar probe Mission.

programme.title: First Light
programme.desc: The New Frontier: First Light, S02E08, For an instrument first developed as recently as the 17th century, the telescope has travelled a long way.

programme.title: Proving Einstein
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Proving Einstein, S04E09, Some of the proof of Einstein’s theories had long been elusive, beyond the capabilities of technology, until now.

programme.title: Mercury Or Bust
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Mercury Or Bust, S04E01, The ESA - JAXA joint Bepi-Colombo Mission is moments away from launch.

programme.title: Return To The Moon
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Return To The Moon, S01E02, The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos.

programme.title: Orbit
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Orbit, S02E03, The International Space Station is undoubtedly the jewel in the crown of low Earth orbit; observation post, research lab and class room.

programme.title: Living Planet
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living Planet, S03E07, With continuous observation of arth from orbit scientists have built a data set over time that reveals much about how the Earth breaths and life sustains itself on this living Planet.

programme.title: Invasion on Mars
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Invasion on Mars, S03E04, The EXO Mars and Curiosity continue their scientific discoveries as we prepare new missions both robotic and manned to the Red planet Mars.

programme.title: WEBB OF LIFE
programme.desc: The New Frontier: WEBB OF LIFE, S05E08, The James Webb Space Telescope is now operational. Launched aboard an Arianne 5 the 10-billion-dollar spacecraft has deployed successfully and reached its orbit around the Sun.

programme.title: Getting There
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Getting There, S02E02, Launching payloads into space is a very difficult task, historically rocket launches are the proverbial 'swords into ploughshares'.

programme.title: OCEANS IN THE SKY
programme.desc: The New Frontier: OCEANS IN THE SKY, S05E07, Juice and the Europa Clipper are two missions to our Solar System’s largest planet.

programme.title: The Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Sun, S01E08, It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea.

programme.title: Juno, Cassini and Beyond
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Juno, Cassini and Beyond, S03E05, The Cassini space craft has completed its mission over Saturn, Juno has reached its target and has commenced its scientific observations of the giant planet Jupiter.

programme.title: The Inner Worlds
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Inner Worlds, S01E03, They orbit between us and our Star, the inner worlds; hidden within the sun's glare often only visible at sunrise or sunset.

STAR LIGHT, STAR BRIGHT, S05E01, The two current science missions to our star; the sun have made great leaps forward in the science of how stars work, how they generate solar winds and how they affect their orbiting planets

programme.title: The Moons of Olympis
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Moons of Olympis, S01E07, These are the the Moon's of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic.

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

programme.title: Danger, Astreroids Ahead
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Danger, Astreroids Ahead, S02E07, The question often rises is the cost of space exploration really worth it? Could the money be better spent elsewhere.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Gravity, S03E09, LISA pathfinder, has led the way for a space based gravity wave detector, what are gravity waves and why are they so hard to detect?

programme.title: Interface
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Interface, S03E10, The Ionisphere, where the Earth interfaces with space, is little understood, it effects radio communications, GPS signals and satellites alike.

programme.title: From There To Here
programme.desc: The New Frontier: From There To Here, S01E01, Series introduction and the study of Earth from orbit.

programme.title: Emissaries
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Emissaries, S02E06, Our solar system is vast, from our own star the Sun to Earth is nearly 150 million kilometers or 1 Astronomical Unit.

programme.title: Exo Planeta
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Exo Planeta, S01E09, As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system.

programme.title: Martian Attractions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Martian Attractions, S04E07, The Latest in Martian exploration from orbit and on the ground, new sources of water and planetary dust storms are a few of the stories unfolding on to the Red Planet.

programme.title: Planet X
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Planet X, S04E04, The New Horizons mission continues deeper into space, it’s next target looming close.

programme.title: Tickets Please
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Tickets Please, S04E03, No spacecraft have traveled so fast or so close to a star before. It is hoped to reveal the source of the solar winds that effect us here on Earth

programme.title: The Ice Giants
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Ice Giants, S01E06, Beyond the asteroid belt lay the ice giants, some can be seen with the naked eye, others only glimpsed once by a passing probe.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic: Cold Case Files Classics, S02E26, Best of the Year Marathon: Serial Killers

programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E03, From England to Texas to Georgia, I.R. will go inside cold case units and watch as police use ballistics testing, old fashioned fingerprints and a new DNA data bank for criminals, to crack open the mysteries of unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E05, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E09, On a summer night in 1987, a 17-year-old girl to come home is found raped and strangled near the Hudson River. And In 1983, a young mother is raped and murdered at work. The crime remains unsolved for two decades.

programme.title: The Boy And The Monster/Secret In The Cellar
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E02, In Portland, Maine a housewife disappears. One year later her body is unearthed in the cellar. I.R. unravels this cold case investigation from the inside out. With the help of science, police are able to uncover a blueprint of the crime.

programme.title: Killings on Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E02, A family is torn apart by their grandparents' murders. Two decades later, a cold case detective takes on the case that has haunted him since he was a child--racing to solve it before the family takes matters into their own hands.

programme.title: Eyes of a Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E13, On February 2, 2010, two masked gunmen commit a violent robbery and shoot Michael Temple Jr., rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. After his band's video goes viral, Trace receives offers.

programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E10, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie reaches a decision about her future.

programme.title: Duet
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E04, While on Planet Thenora, the team is shocked when McKay and marine officer Laura Cadman are suddenly taken aboard a Wraith Dart. When the team shoots down the Dart, they discover a technical glitch has put Cadman's consciousness in McKay's body.

programme.title: Air (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E01, When a military research base is attacked, a small group of civilians and military personnel escape on a ship into deep space. But divisions emerge between those who want to attempt a return to Earth and those who want to remain aboard the Destiny.

programme.title: Air (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E02, After secretly contacting Homeworld Command, Dr. Rush (Robert Carlyle) claims that he has been placed in charge by Gen. O’Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and that there is no hope of returning to Earth. But his assertions are soon questioned.

programme.title: Air (Part 3)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E03, With the air supply failing on the Destiny, a team disembarks to a desert-like planet in search of a mineral needed to scrub the ship's air of carbon dioxide. While one team presses on to find the vital mineral, the other has another goal in mind.

programme.title: Darkness
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E04, The crew has been working throughout the night to try and determine why the ship’s power reserves are critically low. But when Destiny’s flight path towards a solar system reveals three planets, the entire crew hopes that one of them is habitable.

programme.title: Paradise Lost
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E15, Colonel Maybourne visits O'Neill and claims to have a key to a cache of alien technology, but demands a presidential pardon in exchange for it. When SG-1 accompanies Maybourne to retrieve it, they find his intentions may not be all they seem.

programme.title: Metamorphosis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E16, SG-1 discovers that Nirrti is mutating the inhabitants of an unexplored planet with a machine that rearranges their DNA. Captured in an attempt to stop her, O'Neill must find a way to escape before he and SG-1 are subjected to the same fate.

programme.title: Disclosure
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E17, General Hammond and the Pentagon are forced to reveal the existence of the Stargate to other world governments. Senator Kinsey suggests that General Hammond be relieved of his command and that the civilian-run NID oversee the Stargate program.

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E18, SG-1 discovers three human survivors on an off-world planet who claim to be under attack by hostile aliens. While Carter helps repair the ship's computer, she learns that the survivors are hiding a secret…and things may not be all they seem.

programme.title: The Changeling
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E19, Teal'c mysteriously begins to hallucinate and is haunted by visions of an existence where he is a human being. As his paranoia deepens, Teal'c must rely on the help of friend Daniel Jackson to determine where his dreams end...and his reality begins.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E20, SG-1 accompanies the X-53 on its voyage into deep space. When the ship drops out of hyperspace, SG-1 is stranded with no means of getting back to Earth. Their only option lies in exploring a nearby planet where a Stargate is thought to be located.

programme.title: Prophecy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E21, SG-1 encounters a civilization desperate to be freed from the clutches of a Goa'uld. While on the planet, Jonas falls ill. His illness is diagnosed as a brain tumor but it gives him the ability to see the future...where SG-1 are walking into a trap!

programme.title: Full Circle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E22, Daniel appears to O'Neill and alerts him that Anubis has located the Eye of Ra, an object of power hidden on Abydos. With Daniel's help, SG-1 find the Eye first. Determined to have it, Anubis threatens to destroy the planet unless they hand it over.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E01, As SG-1 begins its search for the Lost City, they discover that Jackson has been returned by the Ancients without any memory of who he was. While SG-1 tries to help him regain his memory, they discover that the Lost City is not on the same planet.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E02, Anubis travels to Kelowna after discovering that it has mines of a more powerful source of energy that he can use to make his new weapon more destructive. The leaders of Kelowna contact SG-1 for their help, but make an ill-advised deal with Anubis.

programme.title: Fragile Balance
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E03, A 15-year-old infiltrates the SGC with the startling news that he is Colonel Jack O'Neill, having mysteriously reverse aged 30 years overnight. Possessing O'Neill's knowledge, exact DNA and, above all, his attitude, can he really be O'Neill?

programme.title: Orpheus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E04, Through the help of Daniel, Teal'c visualizes that Rya'c and Bra'tac are being held prisoner in a Goa'uld death camp. With SG-1's help, Teal'c sets out to rescue his son and his mentor, but can he overcome his fears in time?

programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E003, Brenda shops with Kelly and Tiffany and wishes she had their kind of money.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E009, Sympathy and responsibility are at odds when Brenda volunteers for a teen crisis hotline.
